original_text: You must accept five shekels for each extra firstborn male. The shekel must have the same weight as the shekel that the Levites use in God's tabernacle. There are 20 gerahs in one shekel.
korean_text: 한 사람에 다섯 세겔씩 받되 성소의 세겔로 받으라 한 세겔은 이십 게라니라

sentences.original_text: The shekel must have the same weight
sentences.korean_translation: 그 세겔은 동일한 무게를 가져야 합니다

sentences.original_text: as the shekel that the Levites use
There are 20 gerahs in one shekel
